name: Merciless
description:
Made in 2 days for Mini Jam 117

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Right click to dash towards an enemy that is still alive and that you have shot within 2 seconds of.

1. I wish I made it like an arena waves game.

2. I'm mad.

There may be just a couple hundred bugs:)

Music by DavidKBD
